title: Home Soil Test Kits | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Conducting a soil pH test using a home kit.
subtasks: Obtain a soil sample from the garden.
Mix soil, water, and reagent in a provided test tube.
Compare resulting color to a provided color chart.
Interpret test results for soil pH.
Visit a garden store to find available kits.
Order kits online from recommended retailers.
Understand that home kits are less precise than laboratory tests but adequate for gardening needs.
